visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing the proportional distribution of Earth's water supply using percentage breakdowns with interactive slice highlighting
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains three nominal variables representing water distribution categories. Synthetic percentages follow established scientific consensus (USGS), maintaining domain validity through exact summation to 100%. The pie chart effectively communicates parts-to-whole relationships through angular encoding, optimizing data-ink ratio by removing non-essential chart junk. Color contrast between slices (#7CB5EC to #10487F) applies Cairo's preattentive processing principles. Exact percentage labels provide statistical anchors while interactive highlighting focuses attention on the critical 1% fresh water reserve.
